actions.name: Parental Bond

cost.trigger: The user resolves a Physical or Special-Category attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves a Physical or Special-Category attack.

Effect: The user may use the triggering attack freely, with its Power reduced by 66%. This Ability does not apply to [X-Strike] or [Execute] attacks.
